CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 30, 1955, pg. 7, reads: "Polio Inoculation - The program to inoculate all school children in the city and throughout Allegheny County started Monday with skilled doctors and nurses administering the Salk anti-polio vaccine. A scene at McKelvy [McKelvey] School, Bedford Avenue and Erin Street, is shown above as Dr. J. Davies, assisted by (left to right) Miss Ann O'Brien and Ann Hill, Inoculates a youngster. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. J. Davies administering polio vaccine to boy, with nurse Ann O'Brien and Ann Hill assisting in McKelvey Elementary School, Hill District
